availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert N. Hood (Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth S. Romans. Father of Ellen T. Hood. Farmer in Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, in 1860. Employed Henry Davis in Ohio County in 1860. Enrolled in (U.S.A.) in July, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio, Hartford, p. 631.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Ohio County, KY, July 1863, p. 12, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records â€“ Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058, Ohio County Marriages, p. 1.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film 000367208, p. 180.
